00024 BusIfPortmapTab::BusIfPortmapTab(LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00025                                                                  QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00026                                                                  void* dataPointer, 
00027                                                                  QWidget *parent): 
00028 QWidget(parent), 
00029 mode_(BusIfPortmapTab::ONE2ONE),
00030 portMap_(),
00031 busif_(static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)),
00032 component_(component), 
00033 libHandler_(libHandler), 
00034 mapProxy_(this),
00035 model_(&mapProxy_, component, libHandler, this),
00036 view_(&mapProxy_, this),
00037 logicalView_(this),
00038 logicalModel_(libHandler, &model_, this),
00039 physicalView_(this),
00040 physModel_(component, &model_, this),
00041 cleanButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/cleanup.png"), tr("Clean up"), this),
00042 connectButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/connect.png"), tr("Connect"), this),
00043 one2OneButton_(tr("1 to 1"), this),
00044 one2ManyButton_(tr("1 to many"), this) {
00045 
00046         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "BusIfPortmapTab constructor",
00047                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00048 
00049         // mode buttons are checkable and mutually exclusive
00050         one2OneButton_.setCheckable(true);
00051         one2OneButton_.setChecked(true);
00052         one2OneButton_.setAutoExclusive(true);
00053         one2ManyButton_.setCheckable(true);
00054         one2ManyButton_.setAutoExclusive(true);
00055 
00056         model_.setPortMaps(&busif_->getPortMaps());
00057         mapProxy_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00058         view_.setModel(&mapProxy_);
00059 
00060         // set the sources for views
00061         logicalView_.setModel(&logicalModel_);
00062         physicalView_.setModel(&physModel_);
00063 
00064         // remove the ports from the port lists that are already mapped
00065         logicalModel_.removePorts(model_.logicalPorts());
00066         physModel_.removePorts(model_.physicalPorts());
00067 
00068         setupLayout();
00069 
00070         // connect signals from model
00071         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00072                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00073         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00074                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00075         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00076                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00077         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00078                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00079         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(logicalRemoved(const QString&)),
00080                 &logicalModel_, SLOT(addPort(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00081         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(physicalRemoved(const QString&)),
00082                 &physModel_, SLOT(addPort(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00083 
00084         // connect the signals from view to model that manipulate the items
00085         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(removeItems(const QModelIndex&)),
00086                 &model_, SLOT(onRemoveItems(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00087         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(restoreItem(const QModelIndex&)),
00088                 &model_, SLOT(onRestoreItem(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00089 
00090         connect(&logicalView_, SIGNAL(removeItem(const QModelIndex&)),
00091                 &logicalModel_, SLOT(removeItem(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);

00137 void BusIfPortmapTab::restoreChanges() {
00138         // port map model reads the port maps from the component
00139         model_.restore();
00140 
00141         // the lists are refreshed
00142         onRefresh();
00143 }

00145 void BusIfPortmapTab::applyChanges() {
00146         model_.apply();

00149 void BusIfPortmapTab::setupLayout() {
00150 
00151         QVBoxLayout* logicalLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00152         QLabel* logicalLabel = new QLabel(tr("Logical ports"), this);
00153         logicalLayout->addWidget(logicalLabel);
00154         logicalLayout->addWidget(&logicalView_);
00155 
00156         QVBoxLayout* physicalLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00157         QLabel* physLabel = new QLabel(tr("Physical ports"), this);
00158         physicalLayout->addWidget(physLabel);
00159         physicalLayout->addWidget(&physicalView_);
00160 
00161         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00162         buttonLayout->addWidget(&one2OneButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00163         buttonLayout->addWidget(&one2ManyButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00164         buttonLayout->addWidget(&cleanButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00165         buttonLayout->addWidget(&connectButton_, 0 , Qt::AlignLeft);
00166         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00167 
00168         QHBoxLayout* portNameLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00169         portNameLayout->addLayout(logicalLayout);
00170         portNameLayout->addLayout(physicalLayout);
00171         portNameLayout->addStretch();
00172         
00173         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00174         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00175         topLayout->addLayout(portNameLayout);
00176         topLayout->addWidget(&view_);
00177 }

00183 void BusIfPortmapTab::onRefresh() {
00184         logicalModel_.refresh();
00185         physModel_.refresh();
00186 
00187         // remove the ports from the port lists that are already mapped
00188         logicalModel_.removePorts(model_.logicalPorts());
00189         physModel_.removePorts(model_.physicalPorts());
00190 }
00191 
00192 void BusIfPortmapTab::onConnect() {
00193 
00194         // get lists of the selected ports
00195         QStringList logicals = logicalView_.getSelectedPorts(false);
00196         QStringList physicals = physicalView_.getSelectedPorts(false);
00197 
00198         onMakeConnections(physicals, logicals);
00199 }

00201 void BusIfPortmapTab::keyPressEvent( QKeyEvent* event ) {
00202 
00203         // if enter / return was pressed
00204         if (event->key() == Qt::Key_Enter || event->key() == Qt::Key_Return)
00205                 onConnect();
00206 
00207         // call also the default implementation
00208         QWidget::keyPressEvent(event);
00209 }
00210 
00211 void BusIfPortmapTab::onConnectionModeChange() {
00212         
00213         // if one to one button was pressed
00214         if (one2OneButton_.isChecked()) {
00215                 mode_ = BusIfPortmapTab::ONE2ONE;
00216         }
00217 
00218         // if one to many button was pressed
00219         else {
00220                 mode_ = BusIfPortmapTab::ONE2MANY;
00221         }
00222 }
00223 
00224 void BusIfPortmapTab::setAbsType( const VLNV& vlnv, General::InterfaceMode mode ) {
00225         // inform the model of logical signals that it should refresh itself
00226         logicalModel_.setAbsType(vlnv, mode);
00227 
00228         // tell port maps model that abstraction definition has changed
00229         model_.setAbsType(vlnv, mode);
00230 
00231         // remove the ports that already have connection
00232         onRefresh();
00233 }
00234 
00235 void BusIfPortmapTab::onMakeConnections( const QStringList& physicals, 
00236                                                                                 const QStringList& logicals ) {
00237 
00238         if (physicals.isEmpty() || logicals.isEmpty())
00239                 return;
00240 
00241         if (mode_ == BusIfPortmapTab::ONE2ONE) {
00242 
00243                 for (int i = 0; i < physicals.size() && i < logicals.size(); ++i) {
00244                         
00245                         // do not connect empty port names
00246                         if (physicals.at(i).isEmpty() || logicals.at(i).isEmpty())
00247                                 continue;
00248 
00249                         // if connection can be made between ports
00250                         if (model_.canCreateMap(physicals.at(i), logicals.at(i))) {
00251                                 model_.createMap(physicals.at(i), logicals.at(i));
00252                                 physModel_.removePort(physicals.at(i));
00253                                 logicalModel_.removePort(logicals.at(i));
00254                         }
00255                 }
00256         }
00257         // if mode is one to many
00258         else {
00259 
00260                 foreach (QString physical, physicals) {
00261                         if (physical.isEmpty())
00262                                 continue;
00263 
00264                         bool connected = false;
00265 
00266                         foreach (QString logical, logicals) {
00267                                 if (logical.isEmpty())
00268                                         continue;
00269 
00270                                 if (model_.canCreateMap(physical, logical)) {
00271                                         model_.createMap(physical, logical);
00272                                         connected = true;
00273                                         logicalModel_.removePort(logical);
00274                                 }
00275                         }
00276 
00277                         if (connected)
00278                                 physModel_.removePort(physical);
00279                 }
00280         }
00281 }
